name: ColourShifter
description:
This is my first entry into Ludum Dare. I hope that I made a game that suits the theme of "Shapeshift".

I used Pico-8 to code it, a neat little program that aided me quite a bit.

The goal is to shift colours to match the incoming geometric obstacles. You score based on how many shapes fly past you and hit the molten iron below you.

Pressing "UP" moves your character up the conveyor belt and changes suit.

Pressing "DOWN" just changes your suit but in reverse.

Hope you have fun and don`t forget to post your high scores for bragging rights.
